mapper.insert: insert into p_system_version( name, version, type, file_down_address, qrcode_down_address, update_hint, update_date, status, size, is_constraint, version_type, create_user_id, create_time ) values ( #{name}, #{version}, #{type}, #{fileDownAddress}, #{qrcodeDownAddress}, #{updateHint}, #{updateDate}, #{status}, #{size}, #{isConstraint}, #{versionType}, #{createUserId}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: update p_system_version set del_flag=1 where id = #{value}

update p_system_version set
`name` = #{name},
`version` = #{version},
`type` = #{type},
`file_down_address` = #{fileDownAddress},
`qrcode_down_address` = #{qrcodeDownAddress},
`update_hint` = #{updateHint},
`update_date` = #{updateDate},
`status` = #{status},
`size` = #{size},
`is_constraint` = #{isConstraint},
`version_type` = #{versionType},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
id = id where id = #{id}
